item.title: B√†i 6 - Ki·ªÉu D·ªØ Li·ªáu S·ªë Number - L√†m Ch·ªß S·ªë H·ªçc JavaScript
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
üé• Video h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n chi ti·∫øt

Ngu·ªìn: Kh√≥a h·ªçc JavaScript - Kteam

üî¢ Number trong JavaScript

Number l√† ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë·ªÉ bi·ªÉu di·ªÖn t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c lo·∫°i s·ªë trong JavaScript.

let integer = 42;              // S·ªë nguy√™n
let decimal = 3.14;            // S·ªë th·∫≠p ph√¢n
let negative = -17;            // S·ªë √¢m

console.log(typeof integer);   // "number"

üö´ Gi√° tr·ªã ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát

NaN (Not a Number):

console.log(0 / 0);            // NaN
console.log("hello" * 5);      // NaN
console.log(isNaN(NaN));       // true

Infinity:

console.log(1 / 0);            // Infinity
console.log(-1 / 0);           // -Infinity

üßÆ Object Math 

console.log(Math.PI);          // 3.141592653589793
console.log(Math.round(4.7));  // 5 (l√†m tr√≤n)
console.log(Math.floor(4.7));  // 4 (l√†m tr√≤n xu·ªëng)
console.log(Math.ceil(4.7));   // 5 (l√†m tr√≤n l√™n)
console.log(Math.max(1,2,3));  // 3
console.log(Math.min(1,2,3));  // 1

Ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c t√≠nh to√°n:

üîÑ Chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi sang Number 

let str = "123";
console.log(Number(str));      // 123
console.log(parseInt("123px")); // 123 
console.log(parseFloat("3.14kg")); // 3.14

console.log(Number(true));     // 1
console.log(Number(false));    // 0

üèãÔ∏è B√†i t·∫≠p th·ª±c h√†nh 

// T√≠nh BMI
let weight = 70;    // kg
let height = 1.75;  // m
let bmi = weight / Math.pow(height, 2);
console.log("BMI:", bmi.toFixed(1));

// S·ªë ng·∫´u nhi√™n t·ª´ 1-10
let random = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1;
console.log("Random:", random);

üèÜ T√≥m t·∫Øt

‚úÖ Number l√† ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu duy nh·∫•t cho s·ªë
‚úÖ Math object cung c·∫•p h·∫±ng s·ªë v√† ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c to√°n h·ªçc
‚úÖ NaN v√† Infinity l√† gi√° tr·ªã ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát
‚úÖ Chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi b·∫±ng Number(), parseInt(), parseFloat()

üìö B√†i ti·∫øp theo

item.title: B√†i 7 - Kh√°i Qu√°t Ki·ªÉu D·ªØ Li·ªáu Chu·ªói (String) - X·ª≠ L√Ω VƒÉn B·∫£n
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
üé• Video h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n chi ti·∫øt

Ngu·ªìn: Kh√≥a h·ªçc JavaScript - Kteam

1. String trong JavaScript

String (chu·ªói) l√† ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë·ªÉ l∆∞u tr·ªØ vƒÉn b·∫£n.

2. C√°ch t·∫°o String 

// Single quotes
let singleQuote = 'Hello World';

// Double quotes
let doubleQuote = "Hello World";

// Template literals (backticks)
let templateString = `Hello World`;
let multiLine = `D√≤ng 1
D√≤ng 2`;

console.log(typeof singleQuote); // "string"

3. N·ªëi chu·ªói

C√°ch 1: To√°n t·ª≠ + 

let firstName = "Nguyen";
let lastName = "Van A";
let fullName = firstName + " " + lastName;
console.log(fullName); // "Nguyen Van A"

C√°ch 2: Template literals (khuy√™n d√πng) 

let name = "John", age = 30;
let intro = `T√¥i l√† ${name}, ${age} tu·ªïi`;
console.log(intro); // "T√¥i l√† John, 30 tu·ªïi"

4. Thu·ªôc t√≠nh v√† ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c String

ƒê·ªô d√†i chu·ªói: 

let text = "JavaScript";
console.log(text.length); // 10

Truy c·∫≠p k√Ω t·ª±: 

let word = "Hello";
console.log(word[0]);     // "H"
console.log(word.charAt(0)); // "H"
console.log(word[word.length - 1]); // "o"

5. T√¨m ki·∫øm trong chu·ªói 

let text = "JavaScript Programming";

// indexOf() - T√¨m v·ªã tr√≠
console.log(text.indexOf("Script")); // 4
console.log(text.indexOf("Python")); // -1 (kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y)

// includes() - Ki·ªÉm tra c√≥ ch·ª©a
console.log(text.includes("Java"));  // true
console.log(text.includes("Python")); // false

// startsWith(), endsWith()
console.log(text.startsWith("Java")); // true
console.log(text.endsWith("ing"));    // true

6. C·∫Øt v√† thay ƒë·ªïi chu·ªói 

let text = "JavaScript Programming";

// C·∫Øt chu·ªói
console.log(text.substring(0, 10));  // "JavaScript"
console.log(text.slice(4, 10));     // "Script"

// Chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi hoa/th∆∞·ªùng
console.log(text.toLowerCase());     // "javascript programming"
console.log(text.toUpperCase());     // "JAVASCRIPT PROGRAMMING"

// Lo·∫°i b·ªè kho·∫£ng tr·∫Øng
let messyText = "  Hello World  ";
console.log(messyText.trim());       // "Hello World"

// Thay th·∫ø
console.log(text.replace("Java", "Type")); // "TypeScript Programming"

7. T√°ch chu·ªói 

let csv = "Apple,Banana,Orange";
let fruits = csv.split(",");
console.log(fruits); // ["Apple", "Banana", "Orange"]

let sentence = "Hello World";
let words = sentence.split(" ");
console.log(words); // ["Hello", "World"]

8. B√†i t·∫≠p nh·ªè

X·ª≠ l√Ω th√¥ng tin ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng:

function processName(rawName) {
    return rawName
        .trim()
        .split(" ")
        .map(word => word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.slice(1).toLowerCase())
        .join(" ");
}

console.log(processName("  jOhN dOe  ")); // "John Doe"

Ch·ªët l·∫°i:

B√†i 7 gi√∫p b·∫°n hi·ªÉu v·ªÅ ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu String, c√°ch t·∫°o chu·ªói (single quotes, double quotes, template literals), n·ªëi chu·ªói, c√°c ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c quan tr·ªçng nh∆∞ length, charAt, indexOf, includes, substring, split, v√† c√°ch x·ª≠ l√Ω chu·ªói trong th·ª±c t·∫ø.

üìö B√†i ti·∫øp theo

item.title: B√†i 9 - Ki·ªÉu D·ªØ Li·ªáu Boolean - Logic ƒê√∫ng/Sai Trong JavaScript
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
üé• Video h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n chi ti·∫øt

Ngu·ªìn: Kh√≥a h·ªçc JavaScript - Kteam

1. Boolean trong JavaScript

Boolean l√† ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu logic ch·ªâ c√≥ 2 gi√° tr·ªã:

  • true - ƒê√∫ng
  • false - Sai

2. C√°ch t·∫°o Boolean

Tr·ª±c ti·∫øp: 

let isActive = true;
let isComplete = false;
console.log(typeof isActive);  // "boolean"

T·ª´ so s√°nh: 

let age = 25, minAge = 18;
let isAdult = age >= minAge;    // true
let isChild = age < minAge;     // false

T·ª´ h√†m Boolean(): 

console.log(Boolean(1));       // true
console.log(Boolean(0));       // false
console.log(Boolean("hello")); // true
console.log(Boolean(""));      // false

3. Truthy v√† Falsy Values

Falsy Values (lu√¥n l√† false): 

console.log(Boolean(false));     // false
console.log(Boolean(0));         // false
console.log(Boolean(""));        // false
console.log(Boolean(null));      // false
console.log(Boolean(undefined)); // false
console.log(Boolean(NaN));       // false

Truthy Values (t·∫•t c·∫£ c√≤n l·∫°i): 

console.log(Boolean(1));         // true
console.log(Boolean("hello"));   // true
console.log(Boolean([]));        // true

4. To√°n t·ª≠ Logic

AND (&&) - C·∫£ hai ph·∫£i ƒë√∫ng: 

let age = 25, hasLicense = true;
let canDrive = age >= 18 && hasLicense;  // true

OR (||) - M·ªôt trong hai ƒë√∫ng: 

let isWeekend = false, isHoliday = true;
let canRest = isWeekend || isHoliday;    // true

// Default values
let userName = null;
let displayName = userName || "Kh√°ch";  // "Kh√°ch"

NOT (!) - ƒê·∫£o ng∆∞·ª£c: 

let isLoggedIn = false;
let needsLogin = !isLoggedIn;  // true

// Chuy·ªÉn v·ªÅ boolean
console.log(!!"hello");  // true
console.log(!!0);        // false

5. Short-circuit Evaluation

&& - D·ª´ng khi g·∫∑p falsy: 

let user = { name: "John", profile: { email: "john@example.com" } };

// Safe navigation
console.log(user && user.profile && user.profile.email); // "john@example.com"

// Conditional execution
let isAdmin = true;
isAdmin && console.log("Welcome admin!");

|| - D·ª´ng khi g·∫∑p truthy: 

function greet(name) {
    name = name || "Kh√°ch";  // Default value
    console.log(`Xin ch√†o, ${name}!`);
}

greet("John");    // "Xin ch√†o, John!"
greet();          // "Xin ch√†o, Kh√°ch!"

6. So s√°nh v·ªõi c√°c to√°n t·ª≠

== vs ===: 

// Loose equality (==) - Type coercion  
console.log(true == 1);        // true
console.log(false == 0);       // true

// Strict equality (===) - No type coercion
console.log(true === 1);       // false
console.log(true === true);    // true

// Best practice: Always use ===
let isComplete = true;
if (isComplete === true) {  // ‚úÖ Good
    console.log("Task completed");
}

7. B√†i t·∫≠p nh·ªè

Validate form ƒëƒÉng k√Ω:

function validateUser(userData) {
    let email = userData.email || "";
    let password = userData.password || "";
    let age = userData.age || 0;
    let agreeTerms = userData.agreeTerms || false;
    
    let validEmail = email.includes("@") && email.length >= 5;
    let validPassword = password.length >= 8;
    let validAge = age >= 13 && age <= 120;
    let termsAccepted = agreeTerms === true;
    
    let isValid = validEmail && validPassword && validAge && termsAccepted;
    
    return {
        isValid: isValid,
        checks: { validEmail, validPassword, validAge, termsAccepted }
    };
}

let testUser = {
    email: "user@example.com",
    password: "MyPass123",
    age: 25,
    agreeTerms: true
};

console.log(validateUser(testUser));

Ch·ªët l·∫°i:

B√†i 9 gi√∫p b·∫°n hi·ªÉu v·ªÅ ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu Boolean v·ªõi 2 gi√° tr·ªã true/false, Truthy/Falsy values, c√°c to√°n t·ª≠ logic (&&, ||, !), Short-circuit Evaluation, v√† s·ª± kh√°c bi·ªát gi·ªØa == v√† === trong so s√°nh Boolean.

üìö B√†i ti·∫øp theo

item.title: B√†i 10 - Null v√† Undefined - Hi·ªÉu R√µ S·ª± Kh√°c Bi·ªát
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
üé• Video h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n chi ti·∫øt

Ngu·ªìn: Kh√≥a h·ªçc JavaScript - Kteam

1. Null vs Undefined - Kh√°i ni·ªám 

// Undefined - h·ªá th·ªëng t·ª± g√°n
let notAssigned;
console.log(notAssigned); // undefined

// Null - l·∫≠p tr√¨nh vi√™n g√°n c√≥ ch·ªß √Ω
let user = null;
console.log(user); // null

// So s√°nh
console.log(typeof undefined);  // "undefined"
console.log(typeof null);       // "object" (bug l·ªãch s·ª≠!)
console.log(undefined == null);   // true
console.log(undefined === null);  // false

2. Khi n√†o xu·∫•t hi·ªán?

Undefined xu·∫•t hi·ªán: 

// Bi·∫øn ch∆∞a g√°n gi√° tr·ªã
let notAssigned;
console.log(notAssigned); // undefined

// Truy c·∫≠p property kh√¥ng t·ªìn t·∫°i
let obj = { name: "John" };
console.log(obj.age); // undefined

// Function kh√¥ng return
function noReturn() { let x = 5; }
console.log(noReturn()); // undefined

Null ƒë∆∞·ª£c g√°n c√≥ ch·ªß √Ω: 

// Kh·ªüi t·∫°o bi·∫øn s·∫Ω ch·ª©a object sau
let user = null;

// Reset gi√° tr·ªã object
let data = { name: "John" };
data = null; // X√≥a reference

// API response kh√¥ng c√≥ d·ªØ li·ªáu
function findUser(id) {
    return null; // Kh√¥ng t√¨m th·∫•y
}

3. C√°ch ki·ªÉm tra 

let value1;
let value2 = null;

// Ki·ªÉm tra c·ª• th·ªÉ
console.log(value1 === undefined);    // true
console.log(value2 === null);         // true

// Ki·ªÉm tra c·∫£ hai
console.log(value1 == null);          // true
console.log(value2 == null);          // true

// Nullish coalescing
console.log(value1 ?? "default");     // "default"
console.log(value2 ?? "default");     // "default"

4. Nullish Coalescing (??) vs Logical OR (||) 

let userName = "";
let userAge = 0;
let profile = null;

// Nullish coalescing (??) - ch·ªâ thay null/undefined
console.log(userName ?? "Anonymous");    // "" (gi·ªØ nguy√™n)
console.log(userAge ?? 18);              // 0 (gi·ªØ nguy√™n)
console.log(profile ?? {});              // {} (thay th·∫ø null)

// Logical OR (||) - thay t·∫•t c·∫£ falsy values
console.log(userName || "Anonymous");    // "Anonymous"
console.log(userAge || 18);              // 18

5. Best Practices 

// ‚úÖ Good practices
let user = null;              // S·∫Ω ch·ª©a object sau
let userList = [];            // M·∫£ng r·ªóng thay v√¨ null
let settings = {};            // Object r·ªóng thay v√¨ null

// Function v·ªõi default parameters
function createPost(title = "Untitled", author = null) {
    return {
        title,
        author: author ?? "Anonymous",
        createdAt: new Date()
    };
}

// Check parameters
function processUser(userData) {
    if (userData === null || userData === undefined) {
        throw new Error("User data is required");
    }
    return { id: userData.id, name: userData.name ?? "Unknown" };
}

Ch·ªët l·∫°i

  1. undefined: H·ªá th·ªëng t·ª± g√°n khi bi·∫øn ch∆∞a c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã
  2. null: L·∫≠p tr√¨nh vi√™n g√°n c√≥ ch·ªß √Ω ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫°i di·ªán “kh√¥ng c√≥ ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng”
  3. Ki·ªÉm tra: === cho specific, == null cho c·∫£ hai
  4. Nullish coalescing (??): Ch·ªâ thay th·∫ø null/undefined, gi·ªØ nguy√™n falsy values kh√°c
  5. Best practice: D√πng null cho object, [] cho array, "" cho string
